pages.text: cng klaw theid muhammad phra xngkh khux xallxhˌ phuthrng xe ka
phraxngkh mi prasuti læa mi thrng thuk prasuti
læa mimi phu dı semx hemuxn phraxngkh
cng klaw theid muhammad kha phraxngkh khx khwam khumkhrxng tx phracea hæng rungxrun
hı phn cak khwam chaw ray thi phraxngkh di thrng bandal khun
læa cak khwam chaw ray hæng khwam mud khxng wela klangkhun meux man phæ khlum
læa cak khwam chaw ray khxng brrda phu sek pea nı pm ngeuxn
læa cak khwam chaw ray khxng phu xiccha meux khea xiccha
cng klaw theid muhammad kha phraxngkh khx khwam khumkhrxng tx phracea hæng mnusʹy chati
hı phn cak khwam chaw ray khxng phu krasibkrasab thi hlxklx
thi krasibkrasab nı hawxk khxng mnusʹy
